content: learn how to crochet this gorgeous shawl with this crochet pattern it features a variety of basic crochet stitches and showcases the gorgeous colour of the lion brand mandala tweed cakes a free copy of this pattern can be found on my ad supported blog at https //richtexturescrochet com a free video tutorial can be found on my youtube channel https //www youtube com/c/richtexturescrochet skill level easy gauge 15 sts x 4 row of single_crochet = 4 inches finished size 18 x 64 inches yarn mandala ® tweed by lion brand ® 100% acrylic 7 oz 200 g approx 568 yds 520 m worsted/medium weight 4 2 balls of colour lucky penny hook size j/10 6 mm hook adjust hook size if necessary to obtain correct gauge notions yarn needle
